revisionDesc.change: transformed from mycore to TEI P5

place.placeName: Däbrä Hayl Qǝddus Qirqos Qǝddus Giyorgis Qändaʿro
place.settlement: wäräda Ganta ʾAfäšum, ṭabiya Bäʿatti May Mäsanu, qušät Qändaʿro

note.desc: Local tradition tells that the religious site existed before the advent of Christianity.
note.ab: Däbr. The old church stands outside the sity; the recent church associated with Qändaʿro Qirqos has been built close to the city.

15 Mss. photographed: QDQ-001 “Four Gospels”; QDQ-002 “The Rite of the Holy Week”; QDQ-003 “The Book of the Epistle; Miracles of Mary; Miracles of Libanos”; QDQ-004 “Synaxarion (September - August)”; QDQ-005 “Vita of Gäbrä Mänfäs Qǝddus”; QDQ-006 “Vita of Cyriacus”; QDQ-007 “Miracles of Jesus; Vita of St. George”; QDQ-008 “Vita of Täklä Haymanot”; QDQ-009 “Missal”; QDQ-010 “Synoptic Lectionary for the Year”; QDQ-011 “Vita of Abunä Arägawi”; QDQ-012 “Missal”; QDQ-013 “The Book of the Story of the Trinity”; QDQ-014 “The Book of the Matrimony Rite”; QDQ-015 “Missal”.
Tābots of Qirqos, George, Krǝstos Sämra, Maryam (the latter one or two tabots are probably in the recently built church).
